00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *      File:   psymbol.c
00050  * 
00051  *      Description: Symbol table routines for the IMPACT Meta-Description 
00052  *                   Language preprocessor
00053  * 
00054  *      Creation Date:  October 1994
00055  * 
00056  *      Authors: John C. Gyllenhaal and Wen-mei Hwu

00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include <string.h>
00065 #include "psymbol.h"
00066 
00067 L_Alloc_Pool *Psymbol_Table_pool = NULL;
00068 L_Alloc_Pool *Psymbol_pool = NULL;
00069 
00070 /* Create Psymbol_Table */
00071 Psymbol_Table *
00072 create_Psymbol_Table (char *name)
00073 {
00074   Psymbol_Table *table;
00075   int i;
00076 
00077   if (Psymbol_Table_pool == NULL)
00078     {
00079       Psymbol_Table_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Psymbol_Table",
00080                                                 sizeof (Psymbol_Table), 16);
00081     }
00082   table = (Psymbol_Table *) L_alloc (Psymbol_Table_pool);
00083 
00084   /* Initialize fields */
00085   table->name = strdup (name);
00086   for (i = 0; i < PSYMBOL_HASH_SIZE; i++)
00087     table->hash[i] = NULL;
00088   table->head = NULL;
00089   table->tail = NULL;
00090   table->count = 0;
00091 
00092   return (table);
00093 }
00094 
00095 /* Free Psymbol table */
00096 void
00097 free_Psymbol_Table (Psymbol_Table * table, void (*free_routine) (void *))
00098 {
00099   Psymbol *symbol, *next_symbol;
00100 
00101   /* Free all the symbols in the symbol table */
00102   for (symbol = table->head; symbol != NULL; symbol = next_symbol)
00103     {
00104       /* Get next symbol before deleting this one */
00105       next_symbol = symbol->next_symbol;
00106 
00107       /* Free symbol's contents */
00108       free (symbol->name);
00109       if (free_routine != NULL)
00110         free_routine (symbol->data);
00111 
00112       L_free (Psymbol_pool, symbol);
00113     }
00114 
00115   /* Free symbol table itself */
00116   free (table->name);
00117 
00118   L_free (Psymbol_Table_pool, table);
00119 }
00120 
00121 /* Hashes a Psymbol name, 
00122  * returning a number between 0 and PSYMBOL_HASH_SIZE-1
00123  */
00124 int
00125 hash_Psymbol_name (char *name)
00126 {
00127   int hash;
00128   char *ptr;
00129 
00130   hash = 0;
00131 
00132   /* Sum all the characters, shift hash left 1 with each character */
00133   for (ptr = name; *ptr != 0; ptr++)
00134     {
00135       hash = hash << 1;
00136       hash += *ptr;
00137     }
00138 
00139   /* Mask out unused bits */
00140   hash = hash & (PSYMBOL_HASH_SIZE - 1);
00141 
00142   return (hash);
00143 }
00144 
00145 /* Low level add routine, data is not copied, it is just pointed to */
00146 void
00147 add_Psymbol (Psymbol_Table * table, char *name, void *data)
00148 {
00149   int hash_val;
00150   Psymbol *symbol;
00151 
00152   /* Create symbol */
00153   if (Psymbol_pool == NULL)
00154     {
00155       Psymbol_pool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Psymbol", sizeof (Psymbol), 32);
00156     }
00157   symbol = (Psymbol *) L_alloc (Psymbol_pool);
00158 
00159   /* Initialize fields */
00160   symbol->name = strdup (name);
00161   symbol->data = data;
00162   symbol->table = table;
00163 
00164   /* Add to list of symbols */
00165   symbol->next_symbol = NULL;
00166   symbol->prev_symbol = table->tail;
00167 
00168   if (table->tail == NULL)
00169     table->head = symbol;
00170   else
00171     table->tail->next_symbol = symbol;
00172   table->tail = symbol;
00173 
00174   /* Add to hash table of symbol names */
00175   hash_val = hash_Psymbol_name (name);
00176   symbol->next_hash = table->hash[hash_val];
00177   symbol->prev_hash = NULL;
00178 
00179   if (table->hash[hash_val] != NULL)
00180     table->hash[hash_val]->prev_hash = symbol;
00181   table->hash[hash_val] = symbol;
00182 
00183   /* Increment table's symbol count */
00184   table->count++;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /* low-level find symbol routines,
00188  * returns symbol, or NULL if not found
00189  */
00190 Psymbol *
00191 find_Psymbol (Psymbol_Table * table, char *name)
00192 {
00193   Psymbol *symbol;
00194   int hash_val;
00195 
00196   /* Search for name in hash table */
00197   hash_val = hash_Psymbol_name (name);
00198   for (symbol = table->hash[hash_val]; symbol != NULL;
00199        symbol = symbol->next_hash)
00200     {
00201       /* Stop when match found */
00202       if (strcmp (symbol->name, name) == 0)
00203         break;
00204     }
00205 
00206   /* Return symbol or NULL if not found */
00207   return (symbol);
00208 }
00209 
00210 /* Low-level delete symbol routine. */
00211 void
00212 delete_Psymbol (Psymbol * symbol, void (*free_routine) (void *))
00213 {
00214   Psymbol_Table *table;
00215   int hash_val;
00216 
00217   /* Get the table the symbol is from */
00218   table = symbol->table;
00219 
00220   /* hash symbol name to find in symbol table */
00221   hash_val = hash_Psymbol_name (symbol->name);
00222 
00223   /* Remove symbol from hash table */
00224   if (symbol->prev_hash == NULL)
00225     table->hash[hash_val] = symbol->next_hash;
00226   else
00227     symbol->prev_hash->next_hash = symbol->next_hash;
00228 
00229   if (symbol->next_hash != NULL)
00230     symbol->next_hash->prev_hash = symbol->prev_hash;
00231 
00232   /* Remove symbol from symbol list */
00233   if (symbol->prev_symbol == NULL)
00234     table->head = symbol->next_symbol;
00235   else
00236     symbol->prev_symbol->next_symbol = symbol->next_symbol;
00237 
00238   if (symbol->next_symbol == NULL)
00239     table->tail = symbol->prev_symbol;
00240   else
00241     symbol->next_symbol->prev_symbol = symbol->prev_symbol;
00242 
00243   /* Free symbols contents */
00244   free (symbol->name);
00245   if (free_routine != NULL)
00246     free_routine (symbol->data);
00247 
00248   L_free (Psymbol_pool, symbol);
00249 
00250   /* Decrement table symbol count */
00251   table->count--;
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 /* Debug routine, prints Psymbol table's hash table */
00256 void
00257 print_Psymbol_hash_table (FILE * out, Psymbol_Table * table)
00258 {
00259   int i;
00260   Psymbol *symbol;
00261 
00262   fprintf (out, "%s symbol table has %i entries:\n", table->name,
00263            table->count);
00264 
00265   /* For each hash table list */
00266   for (i = 0; i < PSYMBOL_HASH_SIZE; i++)
00267     {
00268       /* Print out only those hash table lines with symbols in them */
00269       if (table->hash[i] != NULL)
00270         {
00271           fprintf (out, "%4i:", i);
00272 
00273           for (symbol = table->hash[i]; symbol != NULL;
00274                symbol = symbol->next_hash)
00275             {
00276               fprintf (out, " %s", symbol->name);
00277             }
00278 
00279           fprintf (out, "\n");
00280         }
00281     }
00282 }
